mapper.select: SELECT si.id, si.scheme_id, si.material_id, si.quantity, si.unit, si.purpose, si.remark, si.sort_order, m.material_name, m.material_code, m.category_id, m.specification, m.price, m.image_url FROM scheme_item si LEFT JOIN material m ON si.material_id = m.id WHERE si.scheme_id = #{schemeId} ORDER BY si.sort_order ASC, si.id ASC
SELECT id, scheme_id, material_id, quantity, unit, purpose, remark, sort_order FROM scheme_item WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT si.id, si.scheme_id, si.material_id, si.quantity, si.unit, si.purpose, si.remark, si.sort_order, m.material_name, m.material_code, m.category_id, m.specification, m.price, m.image_url FROM scheme_item si LEFT JOIN material m ON si.material_id = m.id WHERE si.scheme_id = #{schemeId} AND si.material_id = #{materialId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheme_item ( scheme_id, material_id, quantity, unit, purpose, remark, sort_order ) VALUES ( #{schemeId}, #{materialId}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{purpose}, #{remark}, #{sortOrder} )
mapper.update: UPDATE scheme_item SET material_id = #{materialId}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, purpose = #{purpose}, remark = #{remark}, sort_order = #{sortOrder} WHERE id = #{id}
